title: 21 Questions to Ask Your Crush: Fun & Flirty Conversation Starters

steps.title: This is a silly question that can make your crush relax.
steps.content: This is a silly question that can make your crush relax. It's such a disarming question that they can be as serious or lighthearted as they like when answering. Since meme humor is so all over the place, it's also a really good way to figure out if you two have a similar sense of humor.

steps.title: Ask this question to get them talking about themselves.
steps.content: Ask this question to get them talking about themselves. Give your crush a chance to explain the reason for the name they picked. They might say it's from a favorite book, it's the name of a loved one, or it's the name of one of their favorite places. Whatever they choose, you'll learn something about them.

steps.title: If your crush answers with a celebrity you like, you might have a lot in common.
steps.content: If your crush answers with a celebrity you like, you might have a lot in common. For instance, if you're crushing on a pop star, they might start talking about that artist's albums and what they liked about them.

steps.title: Their answer can tell you a lot about their personality.
steps.content: Their answer can tell you a lot about their personality. Plus, if you start going out, you'll probably be watching movies together, so it's a good idea to find out if you want them to pick the flick.

steps.title: Find out if your zodiac signs are compatible.
steps.content: Find out if your zodiac signs are compatible. If you check your horoscope every day, you're probably dying to know if your signs can hit it off. They might reply that they don't know their sign. If that's the case, you can just ask when their birthday is.

steps.title: Your crush's spending habits give you insight into what they like.
steps.content: Your crush's spending habits give you insight into what they like. If they spend a lot of money on sneakers and you're a fashion junkie, you've just figured out a great way to connect. You two could enjoy a date night at the mall and you have a gift idea for the next birthday or holiday that rolls around.

steps.title: Ask this one to build rapport with your crush.
steps.content: Ask this one to build rapport with your crush. After all, almost everyone has had a crush at some point! Open up and reveal yours, so they learn a little about you. Then, you two can laugh over your earliest crushes. Plus, if they're embarrassed about it, you can playfully tease them later.

steps.title: This fun question helps you get an idea of what kind of person your crush is.
steps.content: This fun question helps you get an idea of what kind of person your crush is. If your crush answers with something pretty tame, you might get the impression that they're a reliable, stable person. On the other hand, they might surprise you!

steps.title: Your crush's answer will tell you what they like and dislike about dating.
steps.content: Your crush's answer will tell you what they like and dislike about dating. If they say they're stressed out by doing classic dates like dinner and a movie, you'll know to switch it up and try something casual. If they like first dates, pry a little bit to find out things they like to do.

steps.title: Getting your crush to open up to you can make them feel more comfortable around you.
steps.content: Getting your crush to open up to you can make them feel more comfortable around you. Their answer can also paint a picture of their personality—they might be shy and hesitant to talk about other people they've kissed, or they may be talkative—it's a great segue to talking about past relationships.

steps.title: Learn about the people closest to your crush, so you find out what they look for in a friend.
steps.content: Learn about the people closest to your crush, so you find out what they look for in a friend. Their answer might tell you if they're really close with their family or if their social circle comes first. It's just another way to gauge if you two have similar values. If family is super important to you too, you've got something in common.

steps.title: Their answer helps you understand how your crush sees themselves.
steps.content: Their answer helps you understand how your crush sees themselves. Specifically, you'll learn how they want others to view them. Maybe they were the class clown and they'll share funny stories. They might say they're kind if they empathize with others, or they may say they're smart if they appreciate logic. This question also opens the door for you to tell them what you enjoy about them.

steps.title: Your crush can use this answer to flirt with you or share what's on their mind.
steps.content: Your crush can use this answer to flirt with you or share what's on their mind. They may admit that they think of you as they drift off! If they think about other things—like their worries or fears, it gives you two something to talk about.

steps.title: Your crush's response can reveal a different side of their personality.
steps.content: Your crush's response can reveal a different side of their personality. Usually, if they're into something weird, it's probably something they don't often mention. Being left-handed? Having freckles? Being awkward? You'll catch a glimpse of your crush's quirky nature with their response. [1] X Research source

steps.content: Questions like this are a good way to learn about what your crush likes. steps.title: Talking about their hopes gets you two talking about the future.
steps.content: Talking about their hopes gets you two talking about the future. Does your crush want to help out their family? Would they travel as much as possible? Maybe they want to learn a certain skill. Their answer will give you a glimpse of their hopes and dreams. [3] X Expert Source Mark Rosenfeld Dating & Relationship Coach Expert Interview. 11 June 2021.

steps.title: Asking about their plans lets you know if you have similar goals.
steps.content: Asking about their plans lets you know if you have similar goals. If you're hoping for a long-term relationship, it's important to figure out if your interests are aligned as a couple. [4] X Expert Source Courtney Quinlan Matchmaker & Dating Coach Expert Interview. 27 August 2021. If they're hoping to score a job out-of-state and you're looking for something casual, you two might hit it off.

steps.title: Ask this one to see if you have compatible values.
steps.content: Ask this one to see if you have compatible values. If they answer with something that you can't stand, then maybe you two don't have similar interests. On the other hand, they may rattle off something that you also love.

steps.title: Use this one to put your crush in charge of the conversation.
steps.content: Use this one to put your crush in charge of the conversation. They might ask you a really unique question that leads to an interesting conversation, or they may play it safe with a generic question. Either way, if they ask you a question, it gives you a chance to share about yourself.

steps.title: This gives your crush a chance to flirt with you.
steps.content: This gives your crush a chance to flirt with you. It also gives you a great opportunity to take your relationship to the next level. Maybe you were at a party and they say they love your confidence and bubbly personality. Once they compliment you, ask them if they'd like to go out with the most confident person in the room.

steps.title: Give your crush the opportunity to share something personal.
steps.content: Give your crush the opportunity to share something personal. If they share a deep secret, they probably feel they can trust you—make a connection by sharing something really personal, too. If they share something silly, play along! Your crush will see that you're fun to be around.
